original_text: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
korean_text: 레위 사람 중에 아히야는 하나님의 전 곳간과 성물 곳간을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람 중에서, 아히야는 보물들을 관리했습니다

sentences.original_text: and over the treasures of the dedicated things
